termsOfService: By purchasing, registering or activating iFetcher kit on our website or through our call center, the Customer acknowledges that they have read and agree with the present Conditions of Use and our Privacy Notice. You should review these the Conditions of Use and Privacy Notice carefully and make sure that you understand them before using iFetcher website or signing up for our services. If you do not agree to these conditions of use, you may not subscribe for, or use, the services or the website.  ​ We want our Service to be as open and inclusive as possible, but we also want it to be safe, secure, and in accordance with UAE Law. So, we need you to commit to a few restrictions in order to be part of the iFetcher community. ​ By Purchasing, registering or activating iFetcher kit on our website, through any outlet or over the phone, you acknowledge and warrant that: ​ You are the legal owner of the registered item. You are over the age of 18 or the age of majority in your province, state or territory of residence; Your contact information such as your contact number, email address and mailing address provided are indeed yours and are valid & accurate at all times; Your email address is valid and belongs to you, or, in the alternative, you have the permission to use the provided email address; You are the owner of the credit card used to purchase iFetcher kit or memberships on iFetcher’s website(s), or have the owner's permission to purchase items using the owner’s credit card or debit card. You are responsible to update your contact information with iFetcher at all times. If your email address is incorrect, iFetcher may not be able to contact You. To update your information,login or click on My Account and follow the steps. Permissions You Give to Us iFetcher reserves the right to contact you: ​ When a lost item has been found For Membership status and renewal reminder For reminders to verify and update contact information For updates to our services, conditions of use or privacy notice Occasionally, iFetcher may wish to contact you about its products or news about the company. These communications are considered marketing emails. If you wish to receive marketing information at this time but change your mind later, you will have the option to have your name removed from mailing lists by clicking on the unsubscribe link in the email or contacting iFetcher via our Contact us page. All communication from iFetcher including but not limited to: emails, texts, phone calls, website, social media pages, marketing materials, online orders etc. will be in the English language . Best efforts will be made to have communications translated in to other languages when possible. If there are any questions or if you need something specifically translated please contact iFetcher and we will do our best to have our communication translated to your language. Indemnification Upon a request by iFetcher, you agree to defend, indemnify, and hold harmless iFetcher and its subsidiary and other affiliated companies, and their employees, contractors, clients or distributors of iFetcher, officers, and directors from all liabilities, claims, and expenses, including attorney's fees, which arise from your use or misuse of this website. iFetcher reserves the right, at its own expense, to assume the exclusive defense and control of any matter otherwise subject to indemnification by you, in which event you will cooperate with iFetcher in asserting any available defenses. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of the password and account and are fully responsible for all activities that occur under your password or account. ​ You agree to: ​ immediately notify iFetcher. of any unauthorized use of your password or account or any other breach of security, ensure that you exit from your account at the end of each session. iFetcher. cannot and will not be liable for any loss or damage arising from your failure to comply with this Section.  You understand that the technical processing and transmission of the Service, including your Content, may involve (a) transmissions over various networks; and (b) changes to conform and adapt to technical requirements of connecting networks or devices. You understand that the Service and software embodied within the Service may include security components that permit digital materials to be protected, and that use of these materials is subject to usage rules set by IFetcher. and/or content providers who provide content to the Service. You may not attempt to override or circumvent any of the usage rules embedded into the Service. Any unauthorized reproduction, publication, further distribution or public exhibition of the materials provided on the Service, in whole or in part, is strictly prohibited. Any client, organization, association, distributor or retailer who distributes, sells or markets any of iFetcher's products or services are not in anyway responsible or liable for iFetcher's recovery services, products, communications, website, app or anything to do with iFetcher. If there are any concerns or product defects customers must contact iFetcher. ​ Disclaimer of Warranty and Exclusion of Liability ​​ iFetcher makes reasonable efforts to provide you with the most current and accurate information on www.ifetcher.com; however, we do not warrant that everything you see on www.ifetcher.com is error free or complete. Neither we nor any of our consultants for www.ifetcher.com will be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, or punitive damages arising out of your access to or use of www.ifetcher.com Notwithstanding the foregoing, and to the fullest extend permissible by applicable Law, everything on this site and all information, content, materials, products (including software) and services included or otherwise made available to you through this site are provided to you AS IS, WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE OR NONINFRINGEMENT. iFetcher makes no representations or warranties of any kind, express or implied as to the operation of this site or the information, content, materials, products (including software) or services included on or otherwise made available to you through this site, unless otherwise specified in writing. You expressly agree that your use of this site is at your own risk. iFetcher does not guarantee that any personal property or pet bearing iFetcher’ s labels or tags will be returned to the Customer (owner), or that, if any personal property is returned to the Customer (owner), that the personal property will be returned in the same condition it was in at the time the item was lost, misplaced or stolen. Any Customer using the services of iFetcher agrees that, in connection with any and all products provided and services performed by iFetcher, iFetcher shall not be liable for a failure to recover any personal property or pet of the Customer bearing iFetcher 's labels or tags or any damage done to the Customer's personal property. iFetcher shall not be liable for any damage whatsoever caused by the Finder or other third party. iFetcher shall not be deemed to be a bailee of the property if it comes into our physical possession, and shall have no duty of care to you in respect thereof. iFetcher is not liable for any loss of property, or for the loss of any animal and/or pet. The Customer will hold iFetcher harmless for any damages, real or perceived, or purchasing iFetcher bags ID tags and purchasing the service from iFetcher or an affiliated store/partner. iFetcher is not an insurance company and does not offer any insurance coverage for any losses, costs or expenses relating to the lost or recovered items . iFetcher does not guarantee that any lost item, bags or personal belongings will be found. iFetcher’s service is not a GPS system, RIFD, implanted chip, or electronic tracking or locating device of any kind. Under no circumstances shall iFetcher, its affiliates or its subsidiaries be liable for any direct, indirect, punitive, incidental, special, or consequential damages that result from the use of, or inability to use, this website, iFetcher kits or any and all damages that result from or arise out of the services provided by iFetcher to a Customer. This limitation applies whether the alleged liability is based on contract, tort, negligence, strict liability, or any other basis, even if iFetcher has been advised of the possibility of such damage. Because some jurisdictions do not allow the exclusion or limitation of incidental or consequential damages, iFetcher 's liability in such jurisdictions shall be limited to the extent permitted by UAE Law. The Customer further acknowledges that activating their iFetcher ID number and creating their online account on the www.ifetcher.com database is the sole responsibility of the Customer (and not of iFetcher) to ensure that information is accurate and updated. iFetcher is not responsible for any of the information contained in the Customer's account. iFetcher does not warrant the authenticity or accuracy of the information contained in the Customer's account. The maintenance of accurate and current information in the Customer's iFetcher account is the sole responsibility of the Customer. The Customer will hold iFetcher harmless for any lapse in service or access to the Customer account which results from any force outside of iFetcher 's reasonable control or influence including, but not limited to, power outages, web site hosting interruptions, telecommunication problems, call center interruption, software problems or iFetcher’s termination and/or dissolution.
privacyPolicyContent: This privacy policy sets out how and why IFetcher (“iFetcher”, “we” “us” or “our”) collects, stores, uses and discloses personal information. We collect a variety of information from visitors to our site and mobile platforms, some of which can be confidential. This document explains the types of information we collect, how we collect it and our purpose of the use of the information. By visiting our website or mobile applications, using any of the services, or providing us with your personal information, you agree to your personal information being handled as set out in this Privacy Policy. ​IFetcher may update this Policy periodically. Your continued use of our services, requesting our assistance or the provision of further personal information to us constitutes your acceptance of the revised Privacy Policy. ​Website & Mobile Application Visitors Like most website and application operators, IFetcher collects non-personally-identifying information that web browsers and servers typically make available, such as the browser type, language preference, referring site, and the date and time of each request. Our purpose in collecting this information is to determine how our visitors are using the platforms. The information collected will also help us trouble-shoot problems, analyse our resources and improve our services. There is nothing in that kind of information that would deem anyone identifiable. ​IFetcher also collects potentially personal information like Internet Protocol (IP) addresses for logged in users. In certain circumstances we may be permitted by law, court or tribunal order to collect and/or disclose certain personal information. When is Personal Information collected? Visitors to iFetcher’s website and mobile application choose to interact with us in ways that require us to gather personal information. The amount and type of information that we gather depends on the type of interaction. We collect information in a number of ways including: ​Visitors visiting and interacting with our website and related software (including mobile applications) Visitors using the “contact” feature or signing up for any newsletters, products or services. Visitors engaging in transactions with usThrough cookies and other technologies designed to give you a better experience on our website and platforms Contacting us independently of the website, such as via email, phone or in-person Completing any survey or quiz Signing up to a membership and online purchase Downloading PDF documents and resources ​In each case, IFetcher collects such information insofar as is necessary or appropriate to fulfil the visitors interaction with us. IFetcher does not disclose personal information, other than as described below. ​Visitors can always refuse to supply personal information, with the caveat that it may prevent them from engaging in certain website or application-related activities in which case we may not be able to provide our services on your behalf. ​Where relevant, visitors consent to IFetcher posting and using any photographs, content and/or personal information uploaded onto our site or have otherwise provided consent to be published on our site or any of our platforms, which may be used in order to provide services, marketing of services, or for the purpose of functions and activities. ​Visitors must not provide us with information about another visitor, unless consent has been obtained and the other visitor is aware of how their personal information will be handled in accordance with this Privacy Policy. ​How is Personal Information used? Personal information is collected in order that the visitor may receive benefit of our products and services. Subject to this Privacy Policy, we may use visitor’s personal information to:​Send services or promotional communications Create or distribute relevant marketing material Promote and market IFetcher, our services and platforms including all social media Any other uses identified at the time by collecting personal information Visitors consent to us using and disclosing personal information in any manner that could reasonably be contemplated by this Privacy Policy and our Terms and Conditions. Cookies A cookie is a string of information that a website stores on a visitor's computer or device, which the visitor's browser provides to the website each time the visitor returns. IFetcher uses cookies to help identify and track visitors, their usage of our site and platform preferences. Visitors who do not wish to have cookies placed on their computer can set their browsers to refuse cookies before using our sites, with the drawback that certain features of our site may not function properly without the aid of cookies. Business Transfers If IFetcher and all of its assets were acquired, or in the unlikely event that IFetcher goes out of business or enters bankruptcy, user information would be one of the assets that would be transferred or acquired by a third party. Visitors acknowledge that such transfer may occur, and that any acquirer of Movement One may continue to use your personal information as set forth in this policy. Is Personal Information used for direct marketing? Occasionally, personal information may be collected to identify particular services that may be of interest to you. Visitors may be contacted and informed about these services and features, feedback may be requested, and updates may be sent. Direct Marketing from IFetcher generally takes the form of an electronic marketing email and customer lists in advertising products. Electronic Marketing: Where we use visitors' personal information to send marketing information by email, SMS, MMS or other electronic means may be done with your express or implied consent. Visitors may provide express consent, for example, by ticking a box or signing where permission is sought. Every directly addressed marketing contact sent or made by IFetcher, will include a means by which visitors may unsubscribe or opt out of receiving further marketing information. Additionally, visitors may also instruct us to remove any previous consent provided for marketing communications via our “Contact” or email below. Customer lists in third party advertising products: Where we use personal information to reach visitors through platforms such as Google Ads; Facebook ads, or other advertising platforms, we may do so with express or implied consent by, for example, ticking a box on an electronic or signing form. This is for the purpose of sending electronic or other marketing information. Links to third party websites: Our website/applications may contain links to the websites of other entities. By clicking on such links, visitors will be redirected to the website of these entities. Visitors should also be aware of how these entities handle personal information. Employment or Contractual Agreements ifetcher may collect personal information in the instance of a job application, or by becoming an employee with us. In these circumstances: Authorization is provided to collect any personal information (whether written or verbal) from any reference or previous employer specified to us, and to hold such information on your personal file for evaluation of future employment with us. ​Storage and Security IFetcher takes all necessary procedures to protect against the unauthorised access, use, alteration or destruction of personal information. However, we cannot guarantee that unauthorised parties will not gain access. IFetcher will not accept liability arising from any unauthorized access to personal information. Privacy Complaints In the case that a visitor believes their privacy rights are breached in any way, they are requested to contact us via the “Contact” feature or directly via our email info@ifetcher.com All such complaints or enquiries will be taken seriously and handled accordingly in a prompt and reasonable manner. Contact Us Visitors may contact us directly for the following reasons: To obtain further information about the way personal information is handled To access your personal information To raise a concern regarding how we handle personal information To correct or update personal information To unsubscribe from any of our mailing lists or to raise concerns regarding unsolicited electronic communications Please contact us immediately for concerns regarding breach of security info@ifetcher.com Privacy Policy Changes IFetcher may make periodic, minor changes to its Privacy Policy. Visitors are encouraged to frequently check this page for any changes to the Privacy Policy. The continued use by a visitor to this site after any change in its Privacy Policy will constitute the acceptance of such change.
aboutIFetcherContent: We believe in people’s honesty, iFetcher will drive it further. Our vision is to improve people quality of life by tapping in the innate goodness of people. iFetcher is a global community service that aims to create a dynamic lifestyle. It provides an innovative approach to safeguarding valuables and belongings and save life's. In line with the Dubai government’s vision of partaking in the social development of the global community, iFetcher pushes the boundaries of social interaction in the hopes of connecting people worldwide. We do this by safeguarding their hard-earned valuables and even save lives in the event of life-threatening situations. Be the first , Be part of it !!!
